title: Can we pray Jummah with only with 2 people? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript:
can we play jummah with only two 
person because um uh because um we   only have two uh person okay that's one two uh 
okay i i got that ayman from germany says can   we pray jumu'ah only with two people the imam 
and one in the congregation the answer is no   you have to pray the minimum for jummah is three 
imam and two people praying in the congregation
